page.title: 03Land Utilisation of the Area
page.content: The soil of the area is not very fertile;thus little arable farming is carried on by local farmers.There is a predominance of pasture and meadowland which supports a local dairy industry. There are many extensive tracts of rough pastureland in the area of { {D1;D2;D3}and{D4}.The same kind of land can be seen in blocks{D5;D8;D9;D10;D11 {and D12}.In these areas,sheep_rearing is the chief occupation of the farmers. The little arable farming that is carried on concentrates mainly on the cultivation of potatoes, turnips,swedes and green veg.These are sold locally or in the markets of Llanelli and Carmarthen. Much of the land in block{D10}has been taken up by the local colliery in the form of railway sidings and tips of waste slag.These still remain although the mine has been closed.
